title: Create RACING GAME-released-on-gaming-platform Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›released-on-gaming-platform‹ is created when the provided IDs of the RACING GAME and GAMING PLATFORM are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›released-on-gaming-platform‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each RACING GAME can be in a ›released-on-gaming-platform‹ relationship with multiple GAMING PLATFORMS
